amendment.description: To provide for improved energy emergency response efforts of the Department of Energy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3214 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3214 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2150) To provide for improved energy emergency response efforts of the Department of Energy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3214 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3214 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 2953.
